alert.note: Alert for Colville Reservation; Foothills of Northeast Washington (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued July 14 at 2:38AM PDT until July 17 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...Hot temperatures, gusty winds and low humidities Sunday and Monday... .Sunday will deliver the hottest temperatures and lowest humidity values of the week. Winds will increase across Central Washington Sunday afternoon and becoming gusty in the evening. A dry cold front will sweep through on Monday delivering strong winds across most districts. New and existing fires will have the potential to spread rapidly. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FOOTHILLS of NORTHEAST WASHINGTON AND COLVILLE RESERVATION... The National Weather Service in Spokane has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Monday morning through Monday evening. * Affected Area: Fire Weather Zone 701 Foothills of Northeast Washington (Zone 701) and Fire Weather Zone 702 Colville Reservation (Zone 702). * Winds: Southwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidities: 16 to 26 percent. * Impacts: New and existing fires have the potential to spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Colville Reservation; Foothills of Northeast Washington
